00015 template <typename ArgumentType>
00016 class InvertFunction: public std::unary_function<ArgumentType, ArgumentType>
00017 {
00018 public:
00019        InvertFunction()
00020        {
00021               m_maxValue = std::numeric_limits<ArgumentType>::max();
00022        }
00023 
00024        inline ArgumentType operator()(const ArgumentType& value)
00025        {
00026               return (m_maxValue - value);
00027        }
00028 
00029 private:
00030        ArgumentType m_maxValue;
00031 };

00037 template <typename PixelType, class Predicate> 
00038 class TUnaryTransformProcessorComp: public iipr::CImageProcessorCompBase
00039 {
00040 public:
00041        typedef iipr::CImageProcessorCompBase BaseClass;
00042 
00043        I_BEGIN_COMPONENT(TUnaryTransformProcessorComp);
00044        I_END_COMPONENT;
00045 
00046 protected:           
00047        // reimplemented (iipr::CImageProcessorCompBase)
00048        virtual bool ProcessImage(
00049                             const iprm::IParamsSet* paramsPtr,
00050                             const iimg::IBitmap& inputImage,
00051                             iimg::IBitmap& outputImage);
00052 
00053 private:

00056 
00057 
00058 // reimplemented (iipr::CImageProcessorCompBase)
00059 
00060 template <typename PixelType, class Predicate> 
00061 bool TUnaryTransformProcessorComp<PixelType, Predicate>::ProcessImage(
00062                      const iprm::IParamsSet* /*paramsPtr*/,
00063                      const iimg::IBitmap& inputImage,
00064                      iimg::IBitmap& outputImage)
00065 {
00066        if (!outputImage.CreateBitmap(inputImage.GetPixelFormat(), inputImage.GetImageSize())){
00067               SendErrorMessage(0, "Output bitmap could not be created");
00068 
00069               return false; // cannot create output image
00070        }
00071 
00072        int imageWidth = inputImage.GetImageSize().GetX();
00073        int imageHeight = inputImage.GetImageSize().GetY();
00074        int componentsCount = inputImage.GetComponentsCount();
00075 
00076        for (int y = 0; y < imageHeight; y++){
00077               PixelType* inputImageLinePtr = (PixelType*)inputImage.GetLinePtr(y);
00078               PixelType* outputImageLinePtr = (PixelType*)outputImage.GetLinePtr(y);
00079 
00080               for (int x = 0; x < imageWidth; x++){
00081                      for (int colorComponentIndex = 0; colorComponentIndex < componentsCount; colorComponentIndex++){
00082                             int pixelOffset = x * componentsCount + colorComponentIndex;
00083 
00084                             outputImageLinePtr[pixelOffset] = m_predicate(inputImageLinePtr[pixelOffset]);
00085                      }
00086               }
00087        }
00088 
00089        return true;
00090 }
